duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic automotive services in the shop area, including tire service, car service, and miscellaneous tasks.
Follow all BSRO applicable BSRO Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and Policies.
Maintain service center standards of cleanliness, orderliness, and appearance of space and equipment.
Interact with Store Manager, Service Manager, and/or Manager of Vehicle Services for assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license at all times and be able to drive customer and company vehicles
